info.name: Word Whirl
info.attribution:
Board layout by ArnoldSmith86 and mousewax. Released to public domain under CC0.

The library image was generated by Midjourney using the prompt "word whirl, water color painting". The background image using prompt "wallpaper of a festive restaurant --v 5 --ar 16:10".

The word list was created with https://www.randomlists.com/nouns and translated by ChatGPT.

Name, description and rule explanation were generated by ChatGPT and tweaked by ArnoldSmith86.
info.description: Create links between words on your cards using clever hints. Together, guess the card arrangement from these clues. A cooperative wordplay challenge!
info.similarAwards:
2022 Spiel des Jahres Recommended
2021 Japan Boardgame Prize Voters' Selection Nominee
2021 Golden Geek Light Game of the Year Nominee
2021 Golden Geek Best Party Game Winner
2021 Golden Geek Best Cooperative Game Nominee
2021 Cardboard Republic Socializer Laurel Winner
info.ruleText:
Setup 📐

  1. Every player joins by clicking on a seat on the left.
  2. Click restart_alt to start the game.

Write Clues ✍️

In the first part of the game, all players write down clues for their cards simultaneously.
  1. Without moving or rotating the word cards, write a clue on each side that relates the two words on that side of your word square. These clues should help the other players guess the arrangement of your cards. For example, if the words are "Snow" and "Sun," the clue might be "Weather."
  2. After writing the clues, press done.
  3. Wait for everybody to finish their clues.

Guess Arrangement 🗣️

In the second part of the game, you go through everybody's clues as a team and try to find the correct word arrangement.
  1. Click on any player's Guess Clues button on the left.
  2. As a team, try to match the clues with the word cards by rotating (clicking) and dragging them to one of the corners. The player that came up with the clues has to remain completely silent and can not intervene.
  3. After all the word cards have been placed, press thumb_up. Correct answers will be highlighted in green, incorrect cards will be returned to the holder on the right. For each correct guess, the team gets a point. ⭐
  4. Continue until you guessed each player's card arrangement.

Winning the Game 🏆

In Word Whirl, you're not playing against each other, but as a team against the game itself. The game ends when all players have had a chance to be the clue-giver. The total score (number of correct guesses) is compared to previous games. The real goal is to have fun though.
